scripts.say: Now, let me explain the plan.
Surely you don't believe that just the three of us... can pin down an enemy of her caliber? That's not an option, Ms. Exeter. You have a brain, please use it more often~
You... Calm down, Exeter, control yourself... Deep breaths... Sigh... Okay, explain it to me.

Ahahah, it's simple, really. Should we encounter Graf Spee during daytime, you will break from formation and flank her. But if we encounter her during night then I guess you won't need to flank her, just keep ample distance from her.
So one of us acts as a decoy while another launches an attack on her... Won't our firepower lack any real punch that way, though?
Sinking Graf Spee is not our objective. Have you forgotten that already?
...Very well. You're right. I'll follow your orders.
Ahahaha~! Now that we have a plan, let's mop up the remnants of the fleet we just fought, then continue the search!
